thread.title: Jewish cemetery vandalized and dozens of graves damaged | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Jewish cemetery vandalized and dozens of graves damaged | Daily Mail Online

author: Anna Hopkins For Dailymail.Com
title: Jewish cemetery vandalized and dozens of graves damaged | Daily Mail Online
text: Dozens of graves are vandalized at Philadelphia Jewish cemetery in the second anti-semitic attack on burial grounds in a week Police say 75-100 graves in Philadelphia have been vandalized over the weekend The incident took place at Mount Carmel Cemetery in the Wissinoming area It is the second time a Jewish cemetery has been targeted this week Published: 22:16 GMT, 26 February 2017 | Updated: 00:23 GMT, 27 February 2017 192 shares comments Police say scores of headstones have been vandalized at a Jewish cemetery in Philadelphia. A police spokeswoman said preliminary estimates are that 75 to 100 graves were damaged at Mount Carmel Cemetery in the Wissinoming section of the city. Aaron Mallin reportedly came to visit his father's grave on Sunday morning and discovered the headstones toppled over. Police say scores of headstones have been vandalized at a Jewish cemetery in Philadelphia A police spokeswoman said preliminary estimates are that 75 to 100 graves were damaged at Mount Carmel Cemetery in the Wissinoming section of the city 'It's just very disheartening that such a thing would take place,' Mallin told WPVI . 'I'm hoping it was maybe just some drunk kids. But the fact that there's so many, it leads one to think it could have been targeted.' RELATED ARTICLES
